message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor. It's a good starting point.
I think I can do better than that. How about a 80/20 split in my favor?
Let's be reasonable. I'll offer you 52% of the money, but I need at least 48% to make this worthwhile for me.
I'll give you a bit less, but I think this is a fair compromise. 68/32 split in my favor.
Okay, I'm willing to go lower.  But I need at least 38% to make it worth my time.  Let's end this game.
